I decided to attempt the V1 bomb when I realized how well my launch sled works on small craft. Here is the result, the engine is slightly larger than it should be, but it is recognizable I think. MechJeb is required.

Here it is sitting on the sled.

Shooting down the runway (or launch track if you prefer)

Just after separation (the sled sticks to the ground very well)

Flying away, it cannot cross the ocean though.

Flight instructions.

1. Turn on ASAS.

2. Turn throttle to full.

3. Launch!

4. Separate as close to the end of the runway as you dare (Or halfway down, it doesn\'t matter too much)

5. Set MechJeb to surface, 0 pitch.
